definition: to accumulate manure/to lay down compost

to amass/to accumulate/to store/measured quantity (such as area of volume)/product (the result of multiplication)/to integrate (math.)/to solve (or integrate) an ordinary differential equation (math.)/old/long-standing
fat/fertile/loose-fitting or large/to fertilize/to become rich by illegal means/fertilizer/manure

sentences.english: The nursery should open fertilizer sources, manure and planting perennial green manure.
sentences.chinese: 苗圃要廣開肥源，常年積肥和種植綠肥。

sentences.english: Then they could burn it, to power and heat the compost facility.
sentences.chinese: 然後，他們可以把沼氣當成燃料，給積肥場供電供暖。
